Get topological features per each node

Source: R/dotprops.R
dotprops-topo.Rd

Assigns to each node a distance from cell body.

get_topo_features(n)

get_distance_to_soma(n)

Arguments

n

neuron object with soma

Value

list with distance and Reversed Strahler order features per node.

vector with distances from soma

See also

dotprops, ngraph

Examples

get_topo_features(Cell07PNs[[1]])

#> $distance
#>   [1]   0.000000   2.891293   5.703212   7.723529  10.314772  12.203266
